mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NUM,Q.TITLE,M.NM,Q.HIT,Q.CON,Q.ANSWER_CON,Q.MEM_NUM,Q.PRIVATE, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(Q.REG_DT,'YY.MM.DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') THEN TO_CHAR(Q.REG_DT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(Q.REG_DT, 'YY.MM.DD') END AS DT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DT,'YY.MM.DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') THEN TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_DT, 'YY.MM.DD') END AS ADT FROM QNA Q INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM WHERE Q.DEL = 1 AND Q.QNA_NUM = #{no}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QNA Q INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM WHERE Q.DEL = 1
AND Q.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND M.NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET DEL =0 WHERE QNA_NUM = #{qna_num}
UPDATE QNA SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE QNA_NUM =#{qna_num} AND MEM_NUM != #{memno}
